entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
